description: This file is a Python script demonstrating how to implement Agentic Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) using the Infinity Reranker. It includes setup instructions, imports, configuration of a knowledge base with URL sources and a LanceDB vector database, integration of the Infinity Reranker, and a test function to verify the Infinity server connection. The script also contains an example interaction with the agent, showcasing reranking capabilities.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with knowledge sources and models, configured for RAG with Infinity Reranker.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads documents from specified URLs and stores embeddings in a vector database.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database implementation using LanceDB, supporting hybrid search.

classes.name: InfinityReranker
classes.description: A reranker that uses the Infinity inference server for fast, local reranking of documents.

methods.name: test_infinity_connection
methods.description: Function to test if the Infinity server is running and accessible.
